alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 7:11PM CDT until June 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Foard County in northern Texas... Knox County in northern Texas... Southern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Swearingen to 4 miles south of Chalk to 8 miles southeast of Guthrie to 7 miles northeast of Swenson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Munday, Knox City, Crowell, Benjamin, Margaret, Vera, Medicine Mound, Truscott, Gilliland, Rhineland, Thalia, and Copper Breaks State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
